42688585564347.name: Peppermint Starlight Mints - 7lb
42688585564347.desc: Peppermint Starlight mints make the perfect complimentary candy for almost any occasion, event, or environment. Are you considering putting a candy dish by the door at home? Do you run a restaurant where customers pay at a counter near the front? These Starlight mint hard candies are recognized all over the world as a true classic. They'll satisfy your sweet tooth and freshen your breath, too. Put some of these individually wrapped treats out in your home, office, or restaurant today.

42726992380091.name: Peppermint Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726992380091.desc: When days at the beach get hot, you can do more than jumping in the waves for a cool-down. Try our refreshing Peppermint Salt Water Taffy to beat the heat. The individually wrapped morsels make them ideal to pack in a beach bag or cooler. Discovered in the late 1800s, salt water taffy was the product of an unfortunate event. When a candy store owner's shop was flooded with sea water, he decided to market his soaked taffys to the public! What a happy accident this incident turned out to be, because people have incorporated taffy into their summer snacks and memories for generations.

42688407634107.name: Smooth & Melty Nonpareil Mint Chocolate Chips - 6.25lb
42688407634107.desc: Awww, these Smooth Melty Nonpareil Mint Chocolate Chips are just so cute, we can't stop looking at them or eating them! In pink, green, and yellow, these minty morsels dotted in white are the daintiest and prettiest confection you can add to any event. Add some to a table at a wedding for a pretty breath-freshener, bring some to a bridal or baby shower to show off their beautiful pastel hues, or even add these to baked goods in the springtime to represent the beautiful flowers in bloom. Nonpareils date back to the 18th century and were originally used to decorate wedding cakes. We're sure glad they're around today too, for everyone to enjoy!

42688380076219.name: Andes Mints - 5lb
42688380076219.desc: Ande's mints make the perfect welcome snack for any home, office, or restaurant. Whether your guests want to freshen their breath after they've had a meal, or you'd just like to make them feel at home with something sweet, these are the treats for you. A perfect blend of creamy milk chocolate and mint filling make these tiny sandwiches of sweetness the perfect refreshment, and they're individually wrapped, so there's no danger of spreading anyone's germs.

42690352283835.name: Jelina Mint Crisp 72% Dark Chocolate Bars - 8ct
42690352283835.desc: Jelina Mint Crisp 72% Dark Chocolate 3.35oz Bar - 8ct

42688615547067.name: Junior Mints - Theater Size - 12ct
42688615547067.desc: Come on you crazy kids. We know these minty, chocolatey breath fresheners didn't happen to find themselves on movie theater shelves accidentally. These Junior Mints in theater size boxes have been making movie kisses all the more sweet for years and years. Grab a box of your own to spice up your movie night with a loved one. Or maybe your infatuation with these mints rests on their delicious chocolate and mint merits alone. Whatever the reason for your love affair with these small minty delights, you'll have 12 boxes per order to enjoy for movie after movie, night after night.

42688741769403.name: Junior Mints Candy Mini Packs - 72ct
42688741769403.desc: Junior Mints are a refreshing candy that's perfect for chocolate lovers. This popular candy includes a smooth mint center that's soft and chewy. The outside is encased in a thin layer of delectable dark chocolate for a rich flavor that's absolutely irresistible!Our bulk Junior Mints include convenient mini packs, which offer the same bite-sized morsels in smaller portions that are perfect for sharing, parties and quick snacking. The first Junior Mints were sold in 1949. Their name was developed as a play on the Junior Miss story collection that was penned by Sally Benson and published in The New Yorker. Today, the Junior Mint is a hugely popular confection. More than 15 million are produced each day! That's a lot of deliciousness for the world to enjoy. Our bulk Junior Mints mini packs include smaller boxes that fit easily into party favors, wedding favors, Christmas stockings and gift baskets!

42690260828347.name: Bob Ross Happy Little Tree Mints - 18ct Tins
42690260828347.desc: Bob Ross Happy Little Tree Mints 1.5oz Tin - 18ct

42689694728379.name: Peppermint Puffs Soft Puff Candy - 20lb Wrapped

42689949827259.name: Life Savers Candy - 20ct
42689949827259.desc: Laver Savers candies have been around for many years. They are enjoyed by everyone from children to adults. These great candies are available in many different colors such as red, purple, green, orange, white, and even yellow. You can get many different flavors such as wild cherry, grape, lime, pineapple, orange, and even butter rum. You are sure to find a flavor that you are able to enjoy. You are also sure to find that these small hard, crunchy candies are able to provide a great deal of taste that you are sure to be pleased with. These candies are great for birthday parties, Halloween, weddings, and more. They come in rolls and you can choose from multi-flavored rolls, or the ones that one has a single flavor depending on your preference. There is nothing that can take you back to your childhood more than the great taste of Life Savers.

42689279361211.name: Jols Sugar Free Licorette Pastille 0.88oz Box - 12ct
42689279361211.desc: Jols Sugar Free Licorette Pastille 0.88oz Box - 12ct

42689694400699.name: Peppermint Puffs Soft Puff Candy - 28lb Unwrapped
42689694400699.desc:
Indulge in the delightful experience of Peppermint Puffs Soft Puff Candy, where each 28-pound batch comes unwrapped, promising an authentic taste of nostalgia with every piece. Crafted with meticulous care, these puffs have been a beloved treat since the 19th century, offering a time-honored recipe that has withstood the test of time.
Our Peppermint Puffs are a testament to tradition, made with pure cane sugar and the refreshing zest of peppermint for a melt-in-your-mouth sensation that's both invigorating and soothing. These puffs are a harmonious blend of soft, pillowy texture and a subtle, sweet peppermint finish that lingers pleasantly.
Committed to inclusivity, we take pride in offering a confection that's free from GMOs, allergens, and gluten, ensuring that everyone can partake in the joy of these peppermint delights. Not only are they fat-free and kosher, but their pure, unadulterated sweetness makes them a guilt-free indulgence for those seeking a lighter treat.
Perfect for refilling your bulk bins, Peppermint Puffs are not just candies; they're an experience to savor. They are a splendid choice for candy buffets, as a charming after-dinner mint, or simply as a refreshing pick-me-up throughout the day. Their elegant simplicity and uncompromising quality make them a staple for candy connoisseurs and casual snackers alike.

42689689747643.name: Orbit White Spearmint Sugar Free Gum 40-Piece Bottle - 6ct

42690268594363.name: Kit Kat Dark Chocolate Mint Duos - 24ct
42690268594363.desc: Kit Kat Duos Dark Chocolate Mint 1.5oz - 24ct
